This app could be great but is cluttered. The first view when opening a photo displays the overlaid top and bottom tool that are useless for viewing and they clutter the screen and viewing experience. The tools will only go away if youif you click on the screen again one more time. This behavior is exactly the opposite of what it should be. just like it is on the old QuickPic app. You press any photo and it needs to opens full screen uncluttered, everything clean, just the image.. then you can press the screen again to bringing out the tools. Another  issue is that the Fonts used in this app are horrible and don't integrate well. This app needs to simply use the Android system native Fonts, that's it.

And because it is slow so I uninstalled it due to which I didn't test it further for other issues as I have checked in case of simple gallery and found that simple gallery has proved very much the recent update of simple gallery has fixed the sharing problem to other apps like shareit .... so if you fix it then there are only 3 competitors-- simple gallery, Quickpic & Camera-roll.. I've been looking for an app to replace quickpic, all the way back since the CM buy-out debacle. Took me some time but this is the one. It's cleaner, with all the main features here. A great app overall, animations are just astonishing and straight up gorgeous, but the only reason of why I won't stick with this app is the fact that mediaretriever doesn't do what it's expected to: there's absolutely no reliable auto refreshing - the only way to NOT see your deleted photos in album is to force-close the app and reopen it, which just makes me mad sometimes. And also there's no folder deletion, which is frustrating too. Everything else is better that great: animations, quality, UI, simplicity, size and performance are all the best in class, as I think.
